title: 无限重启，帮帮忙心态蹦
txt_content:

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
推测是盖亚魔典3里面的猫妖（Werecat）导致的崩服
 Entity Type: GrimoireOfGaia.Werecat (gaia.entity.monster.EntityGaiaWerecat)
        Entity ID: 160307
        Entity Name: Werecat
        Entity's Exact location: -254.20, 69.00, -12.38
        Entity's Block location: World: (-255,69,-13), Chunk: (at 1,4,3 in -16,-1; contains blocks -256,0,-16 to -241,255,-1), Region: (-1,-1; contains chunks -32,-32 to -1,-1, blocks -512,0,-512 to -1,255,-1)
        Entity's Momentum: -0.10, -0.08, 0.15
建议先把config\forge.cfg里面的removeErroringEntities和removeErroringTileEntities后面的false改为true，服务端重启后当再次检测到错误实体可以自动删除，同时如果后台经常报错的话建议回退盖亚魔典3到一个相对稳定版本，或者更新到最新版

skyliye 发表于 2018-4-1 09:38
推测是盖亚魔典3里面的猫妖（Werecat）导致的崩服

建议先把config\forge.cfg里面的removeErroringEntities ...
喔喔。谢谢您
